message.content:
Below is a step‐by‐step solution following the requested format.

────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
1)  ANALYSIS OF THE MAIN TARGET IMAGE
────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
• Overall there are TWO separate structures:

  A) “House”‐shaped structure on the left (5 total blocks):
     – Bottom/Body: Three red blocks forming a rectangular base with arches at the front and back and a small bridging piece in between.  
     – Roof: Two orange triangular wedges meeting in the center to make a simple pitched roof.

  B) “Rocket”‐shaped tower on the right (9 total blocks, stacked in three layers):
     – Bottom Layer (3 blocks):  
       1 Red arch block in the center, flanked by 2 Yellow cubes (one on each side).  
     – Middle Layer (2 blocks):  
       1 Green cube on one side, 1 Blue cube on the other side.  
     – Top Layer (4 blocks):  
       4 orange wedges arranged as a square pyramid “roof.”

────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
2)  SELECTING THE CORRECT BLOCKS FROM THE DICTIONARY
────────────────────────────────────────────────────────

Below is the exact match (shape, color, and orientation) of each piece used.  
Remember: we are not allowed to rotate any dictionary blocks beyond how they appear; we must select them exactly as shown.

A) House‐shaped structure (5 blocks total):  
   1) Red Arch Block #1 (front arch)  
   2) Red Arch Block #1 (rear arch)  
   3) Red Cube #7 (bridging piece in the middle)  
   4) Orange Wedge #13 (left half of pitched roof)  
   5) Orange Wedge #15 (right half of pitched roof)  

B) Rocket‐shaped tower (9 blocks total):  
   – Bottom Layer  
     6) Yellow Cube #8 (left bottom)  
     7) Red Arch Block #1 (center bottom)  
     8) Yellow Cube #8 (right bottom)  
   – Middle Layer  
     9) Green Cube #5  
     10) Blue Cube #4  
   – Top Layer (four wedges)  
     11) Orange Wedge #9  (front face of the pyramid)  
     12) Orange Wedge #11 (right face)  
     13) Orange Wedge #14 (back face)  
     14) Orange Wedge #16 (left face)

────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
3)  STEP‐BY‐STEP ASSEMBLY INSTRUCTIONS
────────────────────────────────────────────────────────

{
  Step1:  Move block with index 1      // Front arch of house
  Step2:  Move block with index 1      // Rear arch of house
  Step3:  Move block with index 7      // Red cube bridging those two arches
  Step4:  Move block with index 13     // Left orange wedge (house roof)
  Step5:  Move block with index 15     // Right orange wedge (house roof)

  Step6:  Move block with index 8      // Bottom-left yellow cube (rocket)
  Step7:  Move block with index 1      // Center red arch (rocket bottom)
  Step8:  Move block with index 8      // Bottom-right yellow cube (rocket)
  Step9:  Move block with index 5      // Green cube (rocket middle)
  Step10: Move block with index 4      // Blue cube (rocket middle)

  Step11: Move block with index 9      // Front orange wedge (rocket top)
  Step12: Move block with index 11     // Right orange wedge (rocket top)
  Step13: Move block with index 14     // Back orange wedge (rocket top)
  Step14: Move block with index 16     // Left orange wedge (rocket top)
}

These 14 blocks, placed in the order shown (from the bottom layer upward), will recreate the two structures exactly as in the target image.
